name: Sounds of Chaos
description:
You can press A,X,B and P keys to use the last 4 buttons and make chaotic music! But it was not very fun, so we just gave more sounds buttons and broke the limitation, oops!

Bug : Do not press the 2nd button.

  1. White just completely plays the sound
  2. Red is toggle button, the sound keeps looping until clicked again
  3. Green is hold, the sounds keeps playing until released,.
  4. Blue is the same sound with a different pitch each time
  • Programming and Design: HowYouDoing
  • Music and Sound Design: Travis Sullivan, https://travissullivan.com/composer/
